website_summaries.verdict: Highly rated for its convenient design, this diaper caddy is a great choice for parents wanting a standard-sized model.
pros: Standard size is slightly larger than most other diaper caddies
Can purchase in a large size
Diaper organizer insert is removable for multi-use
cons: Buyers wished the product was firmer
Felt material appears a little cheap

customer_reviews.title: The Diaper Caddy at Target seems much better.
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't as firm as I thought it would be. Also, due to the fabric it's very hard to spot clean. The Diaper Caddy at Target seems much better.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing! I love the color (not too dark, not too light), I love the sturdiness, and I love the size (not too big or small). I'm able to hold 30 size 1 diapers, an entire plastic case of wipes, two tubes of petroleum jelly, travel size hand sanitizer, baby hats and mittens, a large changing pad, a large burp cloth, a pacifier, chapstick, and a baby brush. Fits perfectly in the pack n play right now alongside the bassinet insert. Posted pics for reference.
customer_reviews.author: BlissfullyySweetTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper caddy! It is both functional and fashionable. The material is high quality and it fits diapers and wipes perfectly. Great for traveling back and forth each week to the babysitter (it holds plenty of diapers for the week,) or for your everyday diapering needs at home.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this is a great diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a great diaper caddy, but I bought mine to use as a car caddy . I needed something for my glasses, notepad and pens,, tissues, and several other things . It's a perfect car caddy for me!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Low quality and low functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Tiny! Doesn't hold hardly enough. And, there was writing in permanent marker all over the inside. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tote is perfect to set you up for a mobile breastfeeding/diapering situation ...
customer_reviews.text: This tote is perfect to set you up for a mobile breastfeeding/diapering situation station. There are pockets on all sides three on the longer sides and one big one on each short side plus three adjustable compartments inside (you can remove the inside dividers since they are just Velcro'd. Its super lightweight so you can stuff it and it wont have extra weight like a basket. Ive already got my mini lanolin, lip balm, hand lotion, tissues, baby wipes, NB diapers and nursing scarf and there is tons of room left for snacks, water bottle, book/magazine/journal, and whatever else I can think of :)
customer_reviews.author: whisper

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic baskets haha
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I created our little diaper station out of a plastic basket for our first two but this time around we wanted to be fancy lol. This diaper caddy is cute and comes in handy. Everything is organized and I do not have to run to get anything. There is enough room to have his diapers, wipes, creams, pacifiers, and more. I'm so happy we made this purchase because I was so tired of the unorganized plastic box. If you're thinking about purchasing you should. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tamerica

customer_reviews.title: Functional and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this caddy to replace a different one I had that I loved; however, one of my kids had stepped on it and broken it so that it was not fully functional anymore. So, I purchased this one in preparation for a new baby. Baby hasn't come yet, but I've loaded it with diapers, wipes, burp rags, and rash cream. It's a nice size to accommodate plenty of disposable diapers, and a few all-in-one or pocket cloth diapers would also fit well. I also like the fact that the dividers can be removed to make the caddy more versatile for future use. And, thankfully, this one shouldn't break if my daughter decides to step in it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: a small toy and hand sanitizer so we have a comfortable and quick changing station at all times
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two: We keep one in the car, with a portable washable changing pad, wipes, diaper cream/ powder, a small toy and hand sanitizer so we have a comfortable and quick changing station at all times. Since we do quite a bit of outdoor activities and have a full schedule for the older kids, we often need to change on the go and dont have time to waste time searching for a changing station in a dirty bathroom. This caddy solves that problem! We use the other to hold baby bottles/nipples/ rings, formula, burp clothe, hand sanitizer and a couple bottles of water to make bottles on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Handy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Good size, thick & sturdy. I like that you can configure compartments inside. I use this to hold all my puppy’s supplies: eye and paw wipes, halter and leash, recycled plastic bags, treats, brush and comb. Outside pockets hold grooming aids- scissors, nail clippers, etc. It’s convenient to have everything in one place that’s portable when you need it. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris U.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I checked to make sure my product had the tree tag and it did. I was really surprised by how study this is and how thick the felt is. I did not find any strange smells associated with this product out of the wrapping. Yes, it needs to be opened with stuff in it to loosen it up, but it looks like it would be sold in a fancy boutique baby store and I would order 1000x of these and give them to friends if any of them were having babies, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Mentzer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS DIAPER CADDY!
customer_reviews.text: It fits so many things: diapers, wipes, ointments, hand sanitizer, lotions, etc. and the best part is that it is so weightless. I saw some negative reviews regarding the lack of structure this product has but is my experience it is perfect. Once it is stocked up it is very sturdy and holds its shape. I am thinking of buying another one as a pumping station. Definitely recommend. P.S. I bought the regular sized caddy and it has plenty of space for all of my baby's diapering needs and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I got the smaller of the two for my breast pump and it’s fantastic! It’s turned into more of a catch all bag for baby. One section has my pump, another has my pumping bra, Haaka and back up pump parts. The other section has my baby’s gripe water, gas and vitamin D drops, suction bulb and other miscellaneous items. The pockets on the sides are super useful as well. I have put baby nail clippers and file, absorbent breast pads, chapstick and granola bars in them. I carry this bag between rooms of the house and take it with me when I know I’ll have to pump on the road. Love the color and the material!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and variety of compartments for storage. The Velcro is nice for separating everything and keeping babies things organized. But I think the product needs some type of base to make it feel more sturdy. Without a base to keep everything in place it feels a little flimsy and the fabric seems inexpensive. Overall, I think it’s a 4/5 diaper caddy but I might pay more for a more sturdy product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organzing and can travel!
customer_reviews.text: We love this diaper caddy. It's perfect for placing diapers, wipes, some burb clothes, and the side pockets can hold your diaper ointment of choice, along with baby's nail clippers, etc. I also got a 2nd one to place by me while I breastfed. In that one, I had a lot of burb clothes along with snacks for me. Bonus: Since it velcros together and apart, we were able to flatten it and take it when we traveled. It's so nice to have some semblance of normalcy when you have a little one on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t impressed unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this but just wasn’t a huge fan of the material and it had a difficult time standing up and the handles got in the way and you weren’t able to maneuver them or move them out of the way bc of material.
customer_reviews.author: Bndgrl83

customer_reviews.title: Has all the necessary pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Nice caddy that holds itself up! My wife bought it, but im using it. Im pretty particular with my organizers, and this is juust perfect. Has slots for everything i need to go up and down stairs once! And it happened to have perfect sized divider for the ubbi baby wipe dispenser! Btw, other review for the ubbi baby wipe dispenser. Get it!! I love boxes, and this is a perfect functional box!
customer_reviews.author: Brian/Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep everyday in the car
customer_reviews.text: While it’s not the stingiest product in the market, it works well and is very light and portable. The caddy has been handy, as we keep an extra of everything baby needs in the back of the car. If we lose or forget something we never worry because we have extra diapers, wipes, toys, books, burp cloths, etc. in the car. Highly recommend and will likely be my go-to purchase for baby showers.
customer_reviews.author: Theskittler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: How did I survive my first baby without this? This tote has been amazing to carry between my bedroom/nursery/living room. I have it packed with diapers, wipes, burp rags, chap stick, nursing pads, lotions, thermometer, diaper creams. I’ve also taken it to our 3 hotel stays with baby and it is AWESOME for traveling! Maybe not travel in an airplane but car travel for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Black

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Portable Diaper Changes Around the House
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to having a baby. I've had it for 2 years and it's great for storing all of the necessary diaper changing supplies in (like diapers, wipes, and diaper rash cream). The caddy is easily transportable across the house, especially important when I had a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E. Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Many Pockets make easy to reach storage
customer_reviews.text: This is sitting next to our changing pad on our nursery dresser. It’s many pockets are holding almost everything we need to do the multiple diaper changes required to keep baby clean and happy. I was happy with the free shipping-why I purchased this product over other similar ones. The interior pockets are adjustable. My husband appreciates the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my mom who has remotes, tissues box, reading glasses, books, glucose meter, eyeglass cleaning cloths, etc. sprawled over her king size bed since it’s just her. I was tired of seeing the stuff everywhere and this worked perfect! Now she can keep it on her bed as she likes but have it neatly organized instead of rummaging through a small pile of stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I think she will like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a shower gift so I haven't actually used it. But, it's very pretty and is very substantial and well made. It is made out of very thick felt and is quite lovely. It would be ideal for carrying supplies from room to room. When the baby gets older it could be converted to carrying little toys, crayons, whatever to grandma's house or maybe organize them in the car. It might work well for crafters too. The possibilities are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Patty S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper caddy! Bought it as a stash bag for my son for books, toys, etc during road trips. It's perfect! Great for a bunch of things to keep him busy and entertained during long trips. Look forward to trying it during our move across country next year. :D
customer_reviews.author: Eklaire

customer_reviews.title: Horrible feeling!!
customer_reviews.text: The product works for organizing, however I cannot stand the feeling of the fabric. I ordered this and thought I’d tough it out instead of hassling with a return and now I wish I had since I’m past the window. I can’t use it due to the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Massaro

customer_reviews.title: Cutest felt caddy ever
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail yesterday. I was impressed with how thick the walls are of this foldable caddy. The gray color is neutral, but slightly leans toward a cool gray. I haven't filled it with my diaper changing supplies yet, but I imagine it would hold everything I would need. I purchased this to have diaper changing supplies on the main floor of my house so I wouldn't have to run upstairs to change my baby (on the way still).
customer_reviews.author: M. Helbling

customer_reviews.title: So useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It’s so useful for keeping all our diaper essentials in one place. We transfer it from the changing table to our bedroom at night. It sits right next to the baby’s Pack N Play for nighttime changes and helps us keep her clean without disrupting her sleep too much. I like that it has big handles and stands upright without being bulky or noisy. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected and bottom is soft
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected and the bottom is soft without a reinforcement so less sturdy than I expected. Looks nice though but doesn't look worth the price. Will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: Bugaboo

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it! You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t think i needed this BUT thank goodness i purchased it! It’s seriously so helpful and i love it! I’m a huge organizer and i like having stuff in its place and since we live in a 2 story house it’s very functional cause it goes up and down with me all around the house. It’s such a huge lifesaver. You need to buy this! It’s perfect for a gift as well!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have Baby Item
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this caddy! I knew I was going to have a c-section with my 2nd baby and I wouldn't want to continue to go to the nursery to change diapers. I loaded this caddy with all the changing supplies and it has been amazing to have it nearby while I heal from surgery. We'll be taking this in the car for road trips so I don't have to always have my husband digging in my diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed in this caddy. It's definitely not as sturdy as it looks in the photos. The inside sectioned piece is held by velcro which will be nice if I want to change compartment size however it feels like it might just pull apart easily too. It will work for our purpose of keeping it in one place but I wouldn't use it to carry anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and was packaged nicely. It was a little smaller than I thought it'd be but I think it'll work perfect for storing a small amount of diapers and a package of wipes. Bought as a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to any nursery
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. I’m not a huge fan of the material (think felt) but it does what I need it to. The price is great as well. I’m able to keep our little diaper station nice and organized with it. Aesthetically, it is simple but attractive.
customer_reviews.author: RBF

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh It Works... I Guess
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for new moms to use as a diaper caddy for around the house. But it’s felt... it’s not very sturdy and the divider is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, thoroughly reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product. Fits a nice amount of diapers & wipes and compartments can be adjusted depending on what you are planning to store. Happy to support such a great family business :)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Ly

customer_reviews.title: Check TJ Maxx/Homegood before purchasing this product and save some money.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the price of the product. The same week mine arrived I found a very similar one at TJ Maxx for almost half the price and same if not better quality. The product itself is versatile. Great way to organize your baby’s everyday products such as diapers, wipes, lotion, and small items (nail clippers, thermometer, hairbrush). I also wish they had more colors to choose from!to match any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Razo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing diaper caddy!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than expected and seems like it will be durable. I have a 16 month old and about to have a newborn and there’s plenty of room to hold supplies for both of my kids so I don’t have to go upstairs every changing or blowout. I’m having a csection and won’t have help 24/7 so it will be nice to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Nastasha McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Buy it directly from Parker Baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, just not happy with Amazon as a company. Go directly to Parker Baby's website to purchase instead of purchasing through Amazon. Anyway, the caddy is a perfect addition to any shower gift because it can act as a gift bag to stuff a bunch of useful baby stuff into! I bought one for myself and just recently purchased it for a friend's baby shower and she was very happy because it wasn't something she'd thought to register for. I've had mine for 4 months now and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Unorthodox use is working out
customer_reviews.text: I decided to use this product to house plastic flatware in the outside pockets, foldable container covers in the front pockets and plastic container lids in the inside pockets. Perfectly fits on my kitchen cabinet pocket shelf. I removed the handles, and it works like a charm to organize that shelf.
customer_reviews.author: EllenL

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality. It does the job though. The inside separation organizer Velcro’s so you can put it different ways but it doesn’t stay up well. Not very sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and no structure
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to have a little more structure but the material is flimsy just like thin felt material and it didnt matter what i put in it it was always an awkward shape didnt sit flat and the side pockets are useles it was only 20 bucks but dont feel like its even worth that. i ended up hating it
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: YES!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this! The structure is sturdy and functional and it's super cute. I definitely think this is one of those pieces I will give as a gift to new moms in the future and plan on ordering another for around the house. This has plenty of room to use for a very long time as the baby grows.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new moms
customer_reviews.text: I created a small gift basket for a pregnant family member using this caddy. It’s very nice and I can see how it would be useful! Also came with a 6 month warranty which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Aliya Rose

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I keep this upstairs or in our living room so that I don't have to go to the nursery for every change. I also use it for travel. So functional and nice to look at. Definitely recommend it to any mom.
customer_reviews.author: Grant S.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Living in a townhouse this product is an amazing must have . We don’t need a diaper station and can change whenever we go. It can hold 60-70 diapers plus other baby essentials. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Neha

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Thought the base or the sides would have been harder but happy with the purchase. Great for keeping it in my bed for night time changes or moving around the house
customer_reviews.author: Candice R.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this product. Mine came with one side unsewn (or maybe ripped?) so two pockets are compromised. I also hoped it would have some sort of removable bottom to help the caddy sit -- it is really floppy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful craftsmanship and very functional. I didn’t have one of these with our first child but it’s great for setting up a portable changing station in our room for our second. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa   SF

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and filled it with baby items. It was completely adorable! The New Mom was very excited. This will be perfect for baby items during those long nights!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Diapers!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is sturdy, well-made and so cute! I love that the divider is velcro so I can take it out if I want to.. I'm using it as a craft/sticker storage tote for my Happy Planner stickers (sticker books are heavy and I am not concerned at all about breaking a strap with this sturdy tote). This is a quality product at an amazing price! I 100% recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: NCP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag, material is sturdy yet soft. I was able to add vinyl to it and it held up. Would definitely buy again in the future for another order.
customer_reviews.author: TayMayCreations

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST BAG!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a pumping bag, i store my spectra s1 and all my pumping supplies in it and take it from room to room or om the go with me everyday. It keeps everything in place ans easy to grab. The fabric is VERY thick so its super durable. I will be buying this as a gift for any baby shower i attend from now on. This is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Caddy
customer_reviews.text: I have twin boys in the NICU and I needed something to transport my items for pumping back and forth from the hospital. This caddy has been PERFECT! I have plenty of space for my storage bottles, pump tubes, and pumping notebook. Once my boys are home, I’ll be using it as a diaper caddy for the living room. This caddy would make a perfect baby shower gift for an expectant mother!
customer_reviews.author: Angeleah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for holding all of our twins needs such as diapers, wipes, a change of clothes and everything else the only thing is I wish I'd bought the larger one but I didn't want to wait for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony G.

customer_reviews.title: For those Type-A moms
customer_reviews.text: If you like to be organized and have everything you need at arms reach, then this is for you. I keep my diapers, wipes, burp cloths, extra clothes, bibs, and other necessities in this beautiful contraption. When I first got it, it seemed a bit flimsy. Don’t let that fool you. It’s held up great! I had something similar with my first kid but this one is way better and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this and the white Parker baby diaper caddy. This would is much better! Bigger and has more storage options - on the outside and inside. The inside compartment divider comes out and attaches so you can change up the space!
customer_reviews.author: K Thoma

customer_reviews.title: Felt fabric for a diaper caddy?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my daughter and when I opened the pkg.,I thought what an inappropriate fabric of felt for a diaper caddy. It would be impossible to clean or wipe off. I would have returned it, but my daughter, who is a new mom, is satisfied with it. She has no experience and may decide later it was a poor choice later.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size - small enough to hide between a side ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a diaper station downstairs for when we don't want to go up to change baby. It's the perfect size - small enough to hide between a side table and the couch but big enough to hold everything we could possibly need for baby. Also attractive enough that it's okay to be out. Because it comes folded up I had to put some heavier things in it for a day or so to get the shape right, but it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: velcro doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Cute but the velcro dividers do NOT stick well. Also, I don't like how you can't make 1,2, or 3 sections, you can only do one big one or 3 different sections.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: The most versatile item every mom-to-be needs
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted one of these when I was pregnant with my son, now I gift one to everybody having a baby! They’re so handy to fill with all the things you need throughout the day, and are perfect to fill with all the goodies you want to gift to your mother-to be friends! My son is 18 months and I’m still using it daily! It’s well worth the purchase in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I must say i love this caddy.. the material is strong and has many compartments... some can b removable as well
customer_reviews.author: kristy Alleyne

customer_reviews.title: Chic and durable!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper caddy is wonderful! It’s a very durable soft sturdy fabric. The grey color matches my home and looks very chic. The storage is great for diapers and wipes and breast feeding supplies. I also use the side pockets for my tv remotes At night in the bed. (I have 3 between tv and Netflix & cable remote) so how they go missing when you are caring for a new baby.... this is the perfect price point for a gift that will wow a mom to be.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal romero

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Very basic so I can have these in any room and it's not an eye sore. The compartments move if desired and it's nice and light. I bought one for each floor of my house so I'm not running all over to get diaper materials. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: JaeyJaey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item three times for me and two other girls for baby shower gift. I am glad I found a stress free and quality guaranteed gift for baby showers😁.
customer_reviews.author: Zaya

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Living in the small apartment with a newborn and use this to hold all her diapers, wipes, diaper cream and other grooming products. Everything fits great in the three large storage compartments and the small pockets along the sides. Easy to carry from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: starsixtyfour

customer_reviews.title: The material is like a felt and the bottom isn't hard
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The material is like a felt and the bottom isn't hard.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It is big enough to hold everything you need and light enough to carry around the house. There are so many pockets. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, functional and well made. Bought for self - Baby #2 on the way and needed a neutral caddy for second diaper station. This is great - nicer than I expected and I love that the divider is removable. This would make a nice gift packed with supplies for a new mama as well!
customer_reviews.author: KMiller

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper caddy, I wish I would have gotten it before I had my baby, but so happy I found it, easy to use and can fit a bunch of items. I keep it right next to my bed so I can change her diaper in the night time
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: It'd be tough to carry around, but is perfect for leaving in the car
customer_reviews.text: It'd be tough to carry around, but is perfect for leaving in the car. Well made, soft fabric, seems washable (I didn't try). Was an adorable way to wrap the baby stuff I gave as a gift. Just load it up, pop a card in one section, tie a ribbon at the top and viola!
customer_reviews.author: mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I’ve already bought a second. The first I use in my car as a diaper/book/toy caddy for both my kids. The second as a diaper caddy inside. They look and feel great
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie

customer_reviews.title: Cute Diaper Party Gift Basket
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift basket to hold diapers. The finished gift basket looked very cute and was perfect because they can use it afterwards to organized their changing area.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not in love
customer_reviews.text: Not in love with this. With such great reviews and being listed as an Amazon choice product I thought it would be awesome. Sadly it’s not very sturdy, and it’s quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper caddy. It's perfect for our baby's nursery. Made well, the color is just as you see here and I feel like I could use this for more than just diapers once she grows out the diaper phase. For example it can hold arts and crafts. We have a 3-year old as well and I wish I had something this nice for her nursery when she was a baby. It's really nice quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Casi_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diaper caddy, especially for the price! It is made of a felt-like material so keep in mind that it won’t be extremely sturdy, but I use it next to my changing pad to store diapers and other changing materials and it works just wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect organizer for Medela pump and parts
customer_reviews.text: I planned to use this for cloth diapering stuff, but it didn't wind up working well for that use. After it sat on the shelf for a few weeks, I rediscovered it as a caddy for my breast pump, and have found it perfect for that use.
customer_reviews.author: duckrabbit

customer_reviews.title: it looks like made of recycled material or something like it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking, it looks like made of recycled material or something like it. Even the cutting/sewing looks like someone using scissors to cut it. Edge is still shabby. If you care about fashion and the feel and look of it. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Kangmin Xu

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and says she will be getting one for a friend who is expecting.
customer_reviews.author: kstan

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know how much I needed this until I purchased. Love having all the supplies in one place that I can carry from room to room. Easy for on the go as well when we go on car trips. Very functional, cute and sturdy. Good quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great caddy
customer_reviews.text: This caddy has been great. The dividers are really nice. It holds lots of diapers and I have a hard sided wipes container in it as well. I wish the handles laid down better or were removable, they can sometimes get in the way. The pockets on the side only have room to put very small, almost flat items.
customer_reviews.author: LBC

customer_reviews.title: good caddy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should. Lots and lots of pockets for storage, comes in multiple sizes. Color is nice, is a soft material but still sturdy. No complaints 2+ months in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy design. Fits way more than I need could ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so that I could have a portable second diaper/wipe/pad/a&D downstairs and didn't have to run up and down the steps. Works perfectly. Sturdy design. Fits way more than I need could probably fit 15-20 newborn diapers or more at a time plus wipes and pad. Only have had for a week so can't vouch for how long it will hold up but seems sturdy for my use and will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Weidner

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a very well made product; I’m very happy with it. I actually bought it to be an organizer for our car that has very little storage space. It will work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, sturdy and perfect for storing diaper stuff!
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: It complemented my baby’s nursery well
customer_reviews.text: Use it in nursery and love it. Had to wash it once due to baby accident and it held its shape (washed by hand and dried in dryer by itself)
customer_reviews.author: Ju

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you want something sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to use this but it’s so flimsy. After using it for 9 months, it completely lost its shape. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Useful for many different storage needs
customer_reviews.text: I use this caddy for beauty supplies, notesbook, etc. instead of diapers but it works great for storing all of the stuff that piles up around my bedroom. Really good quality and looks very nice with my bedroom decor. I love that this product has numerous pockets and dividers that allows me to store a large quantity of items and keeps them all out of sight. Overall, I am extremely happy with this purchase and it is perfect for my storage needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought is as a baby gift and filled up with things.. looks sturdy and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: not very sturdy so I wouldn't recommend putting anything too heavy and ...
customer_reviews.text: definitely feels and looks homemade upon arrival. not very sturdy so I wouldn't recommend putting anything too heavy and carrying it around BUT it does a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: shopshop

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the cheap felt that lines your trunk...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this off of a baby registry and when it arrived I thought I was opening my husband's car parts or something... looks exactly like the lining of a trunk... looks very cheap. I'd be embarrassed to give as a gift, although I'm sure it works just fine for what it's intended for.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen m

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper caddy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper caddy. It looks nice and has plenty of pockets for storage. It holds everything I need it to and fits perfectly on top of my nursery cart. I’m happy with this product and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for room to room storage/ diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: It's very helpful to pick stuff up and carry it from room to room. The many pockets make it easier to store vitamins, lotion, and more.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJane Karpel

customer_reviews.title: Added convience but i thought i wljkd be larger
customer_reviews.text: Although the measurements are posted I somehow expected it to be larger. Other than that the pockets on the outside are great and the compartments organized into creams, diapers, and extra outfits are grest. I love the handles. It makes have a diaper changing station so much more convenient
customer_reviews.author: L. de Ridder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and modern for our changing area in the nursery
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and modern for our changing area in the nursery. Only complaint is that it takes a while for it to stay in form shape, it continues to fold back down.
customer_reviews.author: JHW-California

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great color & texture.
customer_reviews.text: Totally forgot to register for a diaper caddy. This is beautiful, sturdy, and I am guessing, will be well used when my baby arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Christina J.

customer_reviews.title: I really love this diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: I really love this diaper caddy. I am able to customize the sections inside so that it fits things the way I like them. Currently I have an Oxo Tot wipes box in there along with a tub of A&D ointment, diapers, and a rolled up changing pad. It's so nice to have all of my everyday items in one place, organized, and ready to go. The caddy is really classy looking and I know I will be able to find a good use for it even after my youngest is out of diapers. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: NBW

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: i use for my breast pump. i like that it organizes everything and is easy for me to carry from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schales

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it’s a perfect size and it fits perfectly on my changing table. I love the color and quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s made of felt but durable. Hold a lot
customer_reviews.author: Dakoda

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best baby purchases we made. It was especially handy to keep fully stocked in the living room after bringing home a newborn. Now that our daughter is 9 months old we use it to tote around items in the car, or to/from the pool out back.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Winters

product_meta.title: Parker Baby Diaper Caddy - Nursery Storage Bin and Car Organizer for Diapers and Baby Wipes
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL STORAGE BASKET FOR NEWBORN PRODUCTS - The Parker Baby Diaper Caddy (patented) is versatile enough for all that baby stuff: baby toys, diapers, baby clothes, baby wipes, bibs, onesies, baby toys, cloth diapers, changing pads, medicine, burp cloths and other baby essentials! Large enough for dozens of diapers and most wipes dispensers.

REMOVABLE ORGANIZER INSERT - Remove the diaper organizer insert to use as a toy storage bin, baby hamper or nursery basket for additional nursery storage. Our lightweight, portable diaper caddy is 16 x 10 x 7" (Large Size) and made of soft felt and features sturdy outer pockets for additional baby storage.

DESIGNED TO COMPLIMENT YOUR NURSERY DECOR - Our diaper caddy basket is designed with neutral grey colors to look good in any room. It looks good on your changing table, on top of a dresser or next to the diaper pail and is an essential item for your diaper changing station. Easily move the tote around using the long handle.

MULTI PURPOSE KIT - With multiple compartments, you can easily store all of your breast pump and breast pump parts, use as a car organizer, store all those bath products or place bedside to make things easier to find during those late night feedings.
THOUGHTFUL BABY SHOWER IDEA - The Parker Baby Diaper Caddy is a practical gift and should be on every baby registry. It makes for a great baby gift!
